title: What is the best way for a startup to use credit cards? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you talking about procurement cards for your employees or actually using a credit card to manage your business’s finances? If the latter, don’t! Just don’t. Starting a small business involves taking on a lot of risk. Unsecured debt multiplies that risk. You up the chances of failure. Best to live within your means. I recommend Profit First for some guidance.
Use them to look nice in your wallet. Most startups fail and most go under under in 5 years. But credit balances stick with you forever after that.
